description: The Mukhya Mantri Mahila Sashaktikaran Yojana in Madhya Pradesh provides permanent training and financial support for the economic and social upliftment of women who have suffered from violence, enabling them to achieve self-reliance.
key_features: Skill training for survivors of violence

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 3 Lakhs for self-employment ventures

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Madhya Pradesh
additional_criteria: Must be a survivor of violence (e.g., domestic abuse, trafficking)

eligible_activities: Skill training in trades like tailoring, handicrafts, or computer skills
Participating in counseling and rehabilitation programs

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Women and Child Development Office
Submit the application with proof of eligibility
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and proof of violence
Applications are reviewed by a district committee
Selected candidates are enrolled in training and support programs
application_process.note: Applicants may need to provide a police report or NGO certification

special_notes: Priority is given to women in rehabilitation centers
Training is tailored to individual needs
